title: Gold Zakat
description: Gold zakat is obligatory when the gold owned reaches the nisab of 85 grams and has been owned for one full year (haul).
calculation: Zakat = (Gold Weight - Nisab) × Gold Price per Gram × 2.5%
conditions: Gold reaches the minimum nisab of 85 grams
Has been owned for one full year (haul)
It is stored gold, not jewelry worn daily
